name: Shapespeare's Love Comes in All Shapes
name_original: Shapespeare's Love Comes in All Shapes
description: It's a cold day in Neo Neutron City, you're partner is on your hands and you only have one bullet left. You are alone and you only have one shot. But when you make your way to the lab lightning struct, revealing the nuclear tank your father was searching for his entire life. At that point you knew it was a chance, but you took it anyway. You shot the last bullet and thus changed the course of humanity forever...
